setting.name: address_standardization_provider
setting.title: Address Standardization Provider.
setting.help_text: CiviCRM includes an optional plugin for interfacing with the United States Postal Services (USPS) Address Standardization web service. You must register to use the USPS service at https://www.usps.com/business/webtools-address-information.htm. If you are approved, they will provide you with a User ID and the URL for the service. Plugins for other address standardization services may be available from 3rd party developers. If installed, they will be included in the drop-down below.
